title: Problems with PBE when using the link in topic :
body:
I was approved for PBE  quite some time ago, and never saw the email because I stopped using that email;  until i went through it and my junk folder recently. It was over a year ago, actually. When i click the link to the signup page this is what I see: 

[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/whxnck.jpg[/IMG]

replies.body: This is an issue we're currently looking to get more information on.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
